Developing a Growth Mindset

Instead of saying……say this:
I'm not good at thisWhat am I missing?
I give upI'll use a different strategy
It's good enoughIs this really my best work?
I can't make this any betterI can always improve
This is too hardThis may take some time
I made a mistakeMistakes help me to learn
I just can't do thisI am going to train my brain
I'll never be that smartI will learn how to do this
Plan A didn't workThere's always Plan B
My friend can do itI will learn from them
